name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove Sidebar and Next Videos - Youtube

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: So that kids have to type into search to find next video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove youtube sidebar and next videos on screen so that kids have to type in the search bar to find what they want
